Auckland manslaughter trial: Threats forced Joesph Tahana to plunge from balcony to death, Crown says https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-manslaughter-Trial-im-under-attack-threats-forced-man-to-plunge-from-balcony-to-death-crown-says/LOTYDY5EVRDFHDFDE7AIS3H7JE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-manslaughter-Trial-im-under-attack-threats-forced-man-to-plunge-from-balcony-to-death-crown-says/LOTYDY5EVRDFHDFDE7AIS3H7JE/ George Block'He climbed over in fear of violence and it’s that act that caused his death.' Mon, 13 Nov 2023 02:10:36 +0000 Joesph Tahana, 29, was found dead in central Auckland on February 19 last year after falling from his apartment block. The Crown says he clambered over his balustrade to avoid two men intent on robbing him.
Food warning: Area of potentially toxic shellfish in Hawke’s Bay extended https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/food-warning-area-of-潜在-有毒-shellfish-in-hawkes-bay-extended/7SGJW372BZCRJOEWQLI3LJBU5A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/food-warning-area-of-潜在-有毒-shellfish-in-hawkes-bay-extended/7SGJW372BZCRJOEWQLI3LJBU5A/ Toxins in mussels from Tolaga Bay were found to be 11 times over the safe eating limit. Mon, 13 Nov 2023 02:03:49 +0000 New Zealand Food Safety has extended its warning not to collect shellfish from the northern Hawke's Bay coastline.
Bridges and crossings flooded - Fiji braces for cyclone https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bridges-and-crossings-flooded-fiji-braces-for-cyclone/A6SMPUCL2FBRXARZ5NBK5AUBJE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bridges-and-crossings-flooded-fiji-braces-for-cyclone/A6SMPUCL2FBRXARZ5NBK5AUBJE/ A tropical depression east of the Solomon Islands is expected to develop into a cyclone. Mon, 13 Nov 2023 02:01:46 +0000 The forecast path shown above is the Nadi's best estimate of the cyclone's future movement and intensity. There is always some uncertainty associated with tropical cyclone forecasting and the grey zone indicates the range of likely tracks. Photo / Fiji Meteorological Service, RNZ

Failings by Canopy Cancer Care identified in its care of man undergoing chemotherapy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/failings-by-canopy-cancer-care-identified-in-its-care-of-man-undergoing-chemotherapy/GDJYQHPSX5AUFAAMZCWPNBITHM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/failings-by-canopy-cancer-care-identified-in-its-care-of-man-undergoing-chemotherapy/GDJYQHPSX5AUFAAMZCWPNBITHM/ Tara ShaskeyThe man, in his 40s, was in his first cycle of chemo when he became acutely unwell. Mon, 13 Nov 2023 01:54:14 +0000 A man who became acutely unwell while receiving his first round of chemotherapy went into the clinic for an assessment and then died hours later.
